meanings.sent1: The cabezon refused to change his mind about the plan.
meanings.sent2: She can be quite a cabezon when she doesn't want to do something.
meanings.sent3: The cabezon insisted on wearing shorts in the snow.
meanings.sent4: His cabezon nature was like a rock in the face of persuasion.
meanings.sent5: The image of a cabezon as a mule helps remember its meaning.

meanings.definition: A type of fish, specifically a large-headed fish found in the Pacific Ocean
meanings.sent1: The cabezon fish swam gracefully among the coral reefs.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen were excited to catch a cabezon for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cabezon fish wore a tiny top hat for the underwater party.
meanings.sent4: The cabezon's large head made it stand out among other fish.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the cabezon fish made it easy to spot in the ocean.
